tasks.name: calculator
tasks.description: A single object with methods to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and factorial operations.

tasks.name: addition
tasks.description: A unit that performs addition operation.

tasks.name: subtraction
tasks.description: A unit that performs subtraction operation.

tasks.name: multiplication
tasks.description: A unit that performs multiplication operation.

tasks.name: division
tasks.description: A unit that performs division operation.

tasks.name: factorial
tasks.description: A unit that calculates the factorial of a number.
